text:
@realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX Meatpacking plants in Iowa have shown some of the fastest growth of #Covid19.

A Tyson plant in Columbus Junction recorded 186 cases and two deaths, while one in Waterloo only closed last Wednesday after 182 cases were linked to the plant. https://t.co/Ojh0kvthA0 https://t.co/Yw1YSOGBfb
